code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CityList(_ref){let{cities,currentCity,onSelectCity,onUpdateCity,onDeleteCity}=_ref;const[editingId,setEditingId]=useState(null);const[editName,setEditName]=useState('');const handleUpdate=city=>{if(editName.trim()){onUpdateCity(city.id,city.name,editName);setEditingId(null);setEditName('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"city-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Saved Cities"}),cities.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No cities saved yet"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:cities.map(city=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:city.name===currentCity?'active':'',children:editingId===city.id?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"edit-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:editName,onChange:e=>setEditName(e.target.value),placeholder:"New city name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleUpdate(city),children:"Save"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setEditingId(null),children:"Cancel"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"city-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>onSelectCity(city),children:city.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setEditingId(city.id);setEditName(city.name);},children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDeleteCity(city.id,city.name),children:"Delete"})]})]})},city.id))})]});}export default CityList;
